overview:
Co-Founder and CEO of Hitchgreen, based in Boulder, CO.

HitchGreen provides an online meeting and marketplace for ground transportation that enables travelers to define their ground transportation needs while providing carriers with a proactive way to fill unused capacity. We harness a highly fractured ground transportation market and combine that with the best aspects of social networking and travel platforms and make it green enabled!

Hitchgreen is Meetup and Facebook meets Priceline!
